post.desc:
I'm holding on to my bet that this will be a new "generation" of Touhou with ZUN breaking the pattern and no new characters are introduced – instead we get to explore existing characters in further detail under the game's context (dialogues).

And for those unaware, Satori is known as "**11-Point Woman**" for the audacious act of rating herself 11 points out of 10 in a [**character cross review**](https://en.touhouwiki.net/wiki/Strange_Creators_of_Outer_World/Introduction_of_Previous_Works/Subterranean_Animism/Cross_Review).
